text: [Music]
I'm here today to introduce the
multilingual walkie-talkie system this
is a really cool project which is
developed by an innovative customer of
Amazon Web Services and the problem that
Eterna solve is how do I allow users of
different languages to communicate with
one another and the answer is to use
simple walkie-talkie style devices that
allow users to select their languages
and communicate with one another
so here what we have is a walkie talkie
and I can choose my source language
easily but just by changing the knob on
this so it's currently set for
french-canadian and then on the other
side I have a device and this one is set
to English with a US accent and what I
can do with these devices is I can speak
into one in French so I'm gonna speak
into this right now by pressing the
button and I'll say close your Monsieur
you all survived and you can see here on
screen the status of the translation is
displayed in stages it takes just a
couple of seconds and then here on the
other side we get the translated version
coming out in English hello how are you
doing the English speaker can use the
same device and they can say hey I'm
doing great thanks for asking and this
will be automatically translated and
sent to the target device usually listen
to it and here on this demo code a
savage en masse leveled Amadei the
solution uses three AWS services ad is
transcribed is going to convert the
audio into text once we have in text
format we can use AWS translate to
convert it from French to English and
then once we have the English text we
can use a service called Amazon fully to
convert it from text into speech all of
these services are available for AWS
customers and if customers are
interested in building this system you
can go to the github page search for
go - lingo on github and you'll find all
the source files work system as well as
the 3d printed schematics so users can
actually build these devices by
themselves
so that is the taco lingo system
developed by polka thanks very much for
watching and we will see you again
[Music]
